parameters.message: Hello, traveller! I assume that you've come to test your luck in the dungeon nearby.
There is an evil mage residing inside, who has been causing us trouble for quite some time. We have managed to lock him up, but not for long...
If you manage to defeat the mage, you will be rewarded with plenty of gold!
As a proof of your victory, I want you to bring me the mage's staff.
Here is the key. You will need it to get inside.

parameters.name: Visit the dungeon
parameters.description: You have been tasked to visit the dungeon north of the town.
